titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the Indian employment credit and the depreciation rules for property used predominantly within an Indian reservation.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
10/18/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2008 the Indian employment tax credit and the accelerated depreciation of business property used on Indian reservations.
